pages.about: About Milk Bliss – Crafting Dairy Delights with Passion Benefits Production About Us Contacts Privacy Sign up About Milk Bliss At Milk Bliss, our passion lies in creating dairy products that elevate every moment. Rooted in the belief that the purest ingredients yield the most exquisite flavors, we've dedicated ourselves to crafting premium-quality offerings that not only tantalize the taste buds but also nurture the body and soul. Our commitment to excellence transcends product creation; it encompasses every facet of our operations. From meticulously sourcing ingredients to embracing sustainable practices, we uphold integrity and environmental stewardship. Transparency is paramount as we endeavor to foster trust through unwavering dedication to quality and service. Yet, Milk Bliss is more than a mere brand; it's a thriving community. We deeply value the relationships forged with our customers, partners, and team members, recognizing their invaluable support. Together, we revel in life's simple pleasures, savoring each delightful sip. Embark on our journey to spread joy through dairy, and immerse yourself in the blissful world of Milk Bliss. Our contacts Phone number: +91-241-8371386 Address: Ground, 1st And 2,d Floor, Lily Trade, Jahangirabad, Neelam Park, Madhya Pradesh, India Email: milkbliss@gmail.com Benefits About Us Privacy Terms Discover endless bliss in every sip
pages.index: Welcome to Milk Bliss – Your Source of Premium Dairy Products Benefits Production About Us Contacts Privacy Sign up Welcome to the World of Milk Bliss! "Discover endless bliss in every sip" Welcome to Milk Bliss - your gateway to genuine dairy delight! We craft unique products bursting with flavor and nutrition, ensuring each day starts with joy and satisfaction. Our commitment to quality and care for your well-being makes us leaders in the dairy industry. From fresh milk to creams and cheeses, each of our products is imbued with attention to detail and love. Join us on a journey through the realm of natural and delightful flavors - a world where every sip brings you true bliss. About Milk Bliss Milk Bliss is dedicated to crafting premium dairy products that bring joy to every moment. With a focus on pure, natural ingredients, we prioritize flavor and nourishment for your body and soul. We uphold the highest standards of quality and sustainability, fostering trust with our customers through transparency and integrity. More than a brand, Milk Bliss is a community united by our love for delicious dairy. Join us in spreading happiness, one sip at a time. Our advantages Premium Quality Experience the difference with Milk Bliss. Our dairy products are crafted with the finest ingredients, ensuring every sip is a delight. Natural Goodness From farm to table, we prioritize natural goodness. Our commitment to purity means you can trust the wholesome goodness of Milk Bliss. Sustainability Focus Join us in our journey towards a greener future. At Milk Bliss, we're dedicated to sustainable practices, preserving the planet for generations to come. Customer Care Your satisfaction is our top priority. With Milk Bliss, enjoy exceptional customer care and support every step of the way. Community Connection Become part of the Milk Bliss family. Connect with like-minded individuals who share a passion for delicious dairy and joyful living. Our production Our commitment to quality begins right from the source - the serene farms where our cows are nurtured with care and compassion, ensuring that every drop of milk is as pure as nature intended. At Milk Bliss, we pride ourselves on our extensive range of dairy products, crafted to perfection to suit every palate. Fresh Milk. Unadulterated and rich in taste, our fresh milk is pasteurized at optimal temperatures to preserve both its flavor and nutritional value. Cheese Varieties. Explore our assortment of cheeses, from classic cheddar to exotic gouda, each aged to perfection and guaranteed to elevate your culinary experiences. Yogurt. Indulge in the creamy texture and delicate flavors of our yogurts, available in multiple variants - natural, fruit-infused, or Greek, catering to all your healthful cravings. We will contact you I accept Privacy policy Benefits About Us Privacy Terms Discover endless bliss in every sip
pages.privacy: Privacy Policy – Milk Bliss’s Commitment to Your Privacy Benefits Production About Us Contacts Privacy Sign up Privacy Policy This Privacy Policy outlines our commitment to safeguarding the privacy of our users. It details the ways we collect, use, and protect your personal information, and informs you of your rights under privacy legislation. Understanding and Definitions Understanding The terms defined here will have the same meaning regardless of whether they are in singular or plural form. Definitions Account: A unique account established for you to access our service or certain parts of it. Affiliate: An entity that is under the control of, controls, or is under the common control with our company, where "control" is defined as owning at least 50% of the voting stock, shares, or other securities eligible for election of directors or other management authority. Company: Refers to Milk Bliss (HeadlightsShiny). Device: Any device capable of accessing the service such as a smartphone, computer, or digital tablet. Personal Data: Any data about an individual who can be identified from those data (or from those and other information either in our possession or likely to come into our possession). Service: The website operated by Milk Bliss. Service Provider: Any individual or company that processes the data on behalf of Milk Bliss. This includes third-party companies or individuals employed by the company to facilitate the service, to provide the service on the company's behalf, to perform services related to the service, or to assist the company in analyzing how the service is used. Usage Data: Data collected automatically, either generated by the use of the service or from the service infrastructure itself (for example, the duration of a page visit). You: The person accessing or using the service, or the company, or other legal entity on behalf of which such person is accessing or using the service, as applicable. Protection of Children's Privacy Our Service does not cater to individuals under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect identifiable information from children under 13. If you are a parent or guardian and you learn that your child has provided us with Personal Data, please contact us. If we find out that we have collected Personal Data from children without verification of parental consent, we take steps to remove that information from our servers. Should we need to collect information from children under the age of 13, we will do so only with parental consent or as permitted by law. External Links on Our Service Our Service may include links to external websites not operated by us. If you click on a third-party link, you will be directed to that third party's site. We strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy of every site you visit. We do not control, and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party sites or services. Amendments to This Privacy Policy We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. Prior to the change becoming effective, we will notify you via email and/or a significant notice on our Service, and update the "Last updated" date at the top of this Privacy Policy. We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on this page. Getting in Touch If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us: By email: milkbliss@gmail.com Benefits About Us Privacy Terms Discover endless bliss in every sip
pages.terms: Terms of Use – Guiding Your Experience with Milk Bliss Benefits Production About Us Contacts Privacy Sign up Terms and Conditions We urge you to read these terms and conditions with attention before engaging with our services. Clarifications and Definitions Clarifications The capitalized terms used herein are defined under certain conditions and shall retain their assigned meanings whether used in singular or plural form. Definitions Affiliate: Refers to any entity that exercises control over, is under the control of, or is commonly controlled with a party, where "control" encompasses owning 50% or more of the voting rights, equity, or other securities that influence the election of management. Company: This term refers to HeadlightsShiny, the entity behind the service. Device: Encompasses any mechanism that enables access to the service, including but not limited to computers, smartphones, and tablets. Service: This term is used in reference to the website provided by the Company. You: Identifies any individual or entity using or accessing the service, whether personally or on behalf of another legal entity. Recognition These terms and conditions form the foundation of the agreement between you and the company, outlining the legal rights and obligations of all parties in relation to the service's usage. Your use of the service is predicated upon your acceptance of and adherence to these terms. They are applicable to all users, visitors, and others who access or utilize the service. By engaging with the service, you consent to be bound by these terms. If you find any part of these terms unacceptable, you are advised not to use the service. You affirm that you are at least 18 years of age. The company explicitly prohibits the service's use by individuals under 18. Your use of the service is also contingent upon your acceptance of the company's privacy policy, which should be reviewed thoroughly prior to engagement. External Links Our service may feature links to external sites or services not operated by us. These links are provided for convenience and do not signify endorsement. We do not hold responsibility for the content, policies, or practices of any third-party sites or services. It is your responsibility to review the privacy policies and terms of any such sites you visit. Service Termination We reserve the right to terminate or suspend access to our service immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any breach of these terms. Should your right to use the service be terminated, it will cease forthwith. Limitations of Liability In no event shall the company or its suppliers bear liability for any incidental, indirect, special, punitive, or consequential damages arising out of or in connection with your use of the service, regardless of whether such damages were foreseeable. The aggregate liability of the company and its suppliers under these terms is limited to the greater of the amount you have paid to the company for access to and use of the service, or 100 USD if no purchases have been made through the service. Service Provision "AS IS" The service is provided on an "AS IS" and "AS AVAILABLE" basis, without warranties of any kind, either express or implied. The company disclaims all warranties, including but not limited to the implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, and non-infringement. The company does not warrant that the service will function uninterrupted, be secure, or be available at any particular time or location. Applicable Law The laws of the country, excluding conflict of law rules, govern these terms and your use of the service. Your use of the app may also subject you to other local, state, national, or international laws. Dispute Resolution If you have disputes or concerns regarding the service, we encourage contacting the company directly to seek resolution. Severability & Waiver Severability If any provision of these terms is deemed unenforceable or invalid, such provision will be modified to achieve the original intent as closely as possible, and the remaining provisions will remain in effect. Waiver The failure to enforce any right or provision of these terms will not be considered a waiver of those rights. Terms Modification We reserve the right to modify these terms at our discretion. You will be notified of any significant changes in advance, and by continuing to use the service, you accept the revised terms. Getting in Touch Should you have any inquiries regarding these terms, please contact us directly. By email: milkbliss@gmail.com Benefits About Us Privacy Terms Discover endless bliss in every sip
pages.thanks: Thanks for reaching out - Milk Bliss Thank you for choosing our dairy products! Our specialist will contact you shortly. We hope you will be satisfied with our products. Home
